about_the_game:
• The unknown world's malicious surveillance of humanity may be omnipresent...
  • Only those responsible for observing surveillance equipment can see these anomalies from the unknown world.
  • But such surveillance is a double-edged sword,
  • It is inevitable that occasionally one may catch glimpses of other people's private moments or scenes that are indescribable.

  • Carefully compare everything in the scene to see if it matches your memory.
  • If an anomaly is detected, immediately activate the alarm.

    • The player takes on the role of a manager of surveillance camera footage, tasked with identifying anomalies or discrepancies in different scenes across several monitors.
    • If a discrepancy is found in the image, press the alarm button immediately. If no anomalies are detected, continue to observe the next surveillance footage.
    • After reviewing all the surveillance footage for the day and making the correct judgments, the game can be successfully completed.

    Game Duration:

    Approximately 60-180 minutes.

name: Love hotel exit 8

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / RX 580 equivalent or greater
  • VR Support: Quest2、Quest3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You received an invitation in a "special" AV dating app, and after going to the date excitedly, you were involved in an endless loop of couple hotels. Whether facing ambiguity or horror, you must carefully observe all abnormal information. Who is the real inviter? Can you solve these puzzles?
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Indonesian, Japanese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
